properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 2:44PM MST until January 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise ID
properties.description:
...WINTER STORM CONTINUES OVER PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN IDAHO AND
SOUTHEASTERN OREGON...

.Periods of snow will continue over southwestern Idaho and
southeastern Oregon through Tuesday. There may be a few lulls in
snow during this time but another round of moderate to heavy snow
is expected in the mountains on Monday afternoon and evening.
Expect another 10 to 20 inches of snow in West Central Mountains
of Idaho between now and Tuesday. Meanwhile across eastern Oregon
and the southwestern highlands of Idaho, a more pronounced lull
accumulating snow is expected until Monday afternoon when light
to moderate snow will spread back over the area.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3
inches.

* WHERE...Harney County and Malheur County zones.

* WHEN...From 1 PM MST /noon PST/ Monday to 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/
Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM MST /NOON PST/ MONDAY TO 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ TUESDAY
